data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jepson, James E., Heads, Sam W. (2016): Fossil Megaloptera (Insecta: Neuropterida) from the Lower Cretaceous Crato Formation of Brazil. Zootaxa 4098 (1): 134-144, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4098.1.5
